description: Daria Tomenko verifies the authenticity of the BCI forgiveness protocol. After consulting discreetly with trusted community leaders, she decides to release the instructions, aware that this risks rapid upheaval.

Oksana's document, amplified by Daria's confirmation, is leaked publicly, revealing the existence of the BCI forgiveness protocol. The revelation sparks citywide protests, with heated calls for a referendum to decide its activation.

Public assemblies and mass rallies take over the city. Arguments erupt between those demanding a clean slate and those opposed to erasing BCI histories, while rumors of Council interference circulate widely.
A paper ballot referendum is held under tense conditions. Amid scattered disruption and intense debate, the majority narrowly votes to activate the forgiveness protocol.

The BCI forgiveness protocol is triggered: all behavioral scores are erased, flagged citizens are restored, and Stenograd enters a period of chaotic, uncertain reconciliation as communities struggle to redefine trust.
